meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Myanmar.
meanings.sent1: In Myanmar, people use kyats to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for kyats at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The kyats in my wallet were feeling lonely without any friends.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a million kyats.
meanings.sent5: The colorful kyats shimmered in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.sent1: She handed me a handful of kyats to pay for the meal.
meanings.sent2: The market was bustling with vendors selling various goods for kyats.
meanings.sent3: The kyats on the table seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the sound of clinking kyats as people made transactions.
meanings.sent5: The pile of kyats grew larger as more customers came to shop at the store.
